Actions.Name: Modify Setting
Actions.Tooltip: Modify Setting - Allows you to easily modify various VoiceMeeter settings.

Actions.Name: Mute/Unmute
Actions.Tooltip: Mute/Unmute - See a live indication of the current status on Stream Deck (never forget your microphone on again!).

Actions.Name: Advanced Press/Long-Press
Actions.Tooltip: Advanced Press/Long-Press - Directly access any setting through text. Supports both Press and Long-Press (allows you to change between two preset list of settings).

Actions.Name: Advanced Toggle
Actions.Tooltip: Advanced Toggle - Focused on toggling between two modes (versus click and long click in the VoiceMeeter Advanced Click/Long-Click).

Actions.Name: Advanced PTT
Actions.Tooltip: Advanced PTT - Enable settings until you release the button

Actions.Name: MacroButton Toggle
Actions.Tooltip: MacroButton Toggle - Enable/Disable a VoiceMeeter MacroButton

Author: BarRaider
Description:
VoiceMeeter integration and live feedback. Five different actions all supporting a variety of customized features. Control VoiceMeeter and get live feedback all on your Stream Deck.
NEW: Hotkey support and MIDI Support
Name: VoiceMeeter Integration
